statement.title: Content
statement.content: Please write a program to calculate the $k\_{th}$ positive integer that is coprime with $m$ and $n$ simultaneously. $A$ is coprime with $B$ when their greatest common divisor is $1$.

statement.title: Standard Input
statement.content:
The first line contains one integer $T$ representing the number of test cases. 

For each case, there's one line containing three integers $m$, $n$ and $k$ ($0 < m, n, k \leq 10^9$ ).

statement.title: Standard Output
statement.content:
For each test case, in one line print the case number and the $k\_{th}$ positive integer that is coprime with $m$ and $n$. 

Please follow the format of the sample output.

statement.title: Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
3 6 9 1 6 9 2 6 9 3Case 1: 1 Case 2: 5 Case 3: 7
